example:
() => (
  <Stack direction="row">
    <ButtonLink href="/" title="Homepage">
      Go home
    </ButtonLink>
    <ButtonLink asComponent="div" href="/" title="Homepage">
      Go home
    </ButtonLink>
    <ButtonLink
      external
      href="https://orbit.kiwi/components/buttonlink/"
      iconRight={<Icons.ChevronRight />}
      title="Opens in new window"
    >
      Read the docs
    </ButtonLink>
  </Stack>
)

info.title: Button links as links
info.description: 1. When button links have an *href* prop, they are automatically rendered as <a> elements. 2. You can override this using an *asComponent* prop. 3. Button links marked as *external* automatically open in a new window with *noopener noreferrer* as the *rel* attribute for security.
